page.original:
&ltARRAY>.DELETE() Syntax &ltARRAY>.DELETE( Position as N, Count as N ) Object_Address.Choice.List.Delete( Position as N, Count as N ) ArgumentDescription Object_AddressThe address of a list or combo box on a form. PositionThe number of the first element to delete. CountThe number of elements to delete.
Description The &ltARRAY>.DELETE() method deletes Count entries in a single dimensional array starting at Position. "Empty" entries in the array are closed up. Contrast this with <ARRAY>.CLEAR() which does not close up empty entries. See Also Array Functions and Methods Example Assume an array "A" contains the following elements: ElementValue A[1]Orange A[2]Banana A[3]Apple A[4]Pineapple A.delete(2,2) ? A ElementValue A[1]Orange A[2]Pineapple A[3] A[4]
